alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:46PM EDT until August 10 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Peyster, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Rensselaer Falls, Heuvelton, Morley, Norwood, Madrid, Pierrepont, De Peyster, North Stockholm, Pyrites, West Parishville, North Russell, West Stockholm, West Potsdam, De Kalb Junction, and Hannawa Falls. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
